definition: to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)

sentences.english: Even so, the peace activists of the day reacted to the news of his Nobel Prize with mortification.
sentences.chinese: 当时的和平活动家们也对他成为诺奖得主感到耻辱。

sentences.english: Iaquinta also offered his views on who should win this year's Golden Ball.
sentences.chinese: 亚昆塔也给出了对于今年金球奖得主自己的观点。

sentences.english: Jean-Marie Lehn, French ambassador to China and winner of Nobel Prize for Chemistry delivered a speech.
sentences.chinese: 法国驻华大使和诺贝尔化学奖得主廉恩博士发表演讲。

sentences.english: He is among the recipients of the 2002 AAAS Newcomb Cleveland Prize.
sentences.chinese: 他是2002年美国科学促进协会的克里夫兰奖得主。

sentences.english: That would point to countries like New Zealand and Denmark.
sentences.chinese: 这样说来，新西兰和丹麦则是理想得主。

sentences.english: This year, an American researcher was the winner of the Tyler Prize for Environmental Achievement.
sentences.chinese: 今年，美国研究人员是在泰勒环境成就奖得主。

sentences.english: But I heard that Olympic Marseille is the year's winner of Champions Cup.
sentences.chinese: 我听说欧洲冠军杯今年的得主是奥林匹克马赛队。

sentences.english: In addition, Mr. Zoellick has received numerous distinguished service awards.
sentences.chinese: 此外，佐利克先生还是若干杰出服务奖得主。

sentences.english: But I heard that Olympic Marseille is this year's winner of Champions Cup.
sentences.chinese: 但我听说欧洲冠军杯今年的得主是奥林匹克马赛队。

sentences.english: The Golden Ball winner beat Storari with a cold-blooded shot from a medium distance to give Milan the lead.
sentences.chinese: 金球奖得主无情的中距离远射击败了斯托拉里。

sentences.english: A:Robert was the first prize winner for this race last year.
sentences.chinese: 罗伯特去年是这个比赛项目的冠军得主。

sentences.english: It is performed by Zhang Yechuan, who has won the highest award of drama in China "Meihua(plum flower) Award".
sentences.chinese: 饰演南越王赵佗的则是张页川是中国戏剧梅花奖得主。

sentences.english: He is hoping to find a deserving winner.
sentences.chinese: 他希望能找到受之无愧的得主。

sentences.english: Smith is a three-time Grammy Award winner, and he has earned 34 Dove Awards.
sentences.chinese: 迈克尔是三届格莱美奖得主，他赢得了34个白鸽奖。

sentences.english: The Holy Spirit equips us to obey the Lord in whatever He calls us to do.
sentences.chinese: 无论如何得主的召唤，圣灵令我们遵从他的旨意行事。

sentences.english: May the Lord grant that he will find mercy from the Lord on that day!
sentences.chinese: 愿主使他在那日得主的怜悯。

definition: to take (after a struggle)/to wrest/to seize/to capture/to win (a trophy)
laurel/victory garland (in Greek and Western culture)
special glory/distinction/rare honor/one's laurels/it's a privilege (to meet you)
Nobel Prize/abbr. for 諾貝爾獎|诺贝尔奖[Nuo4 bei4 er3 Jiang3]
